edu.tamu.cse.lenss.edgeKeeper.server

Class EKHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • edu.tamu.cse.lenss.edgeKeeper.server.EKHandler
  • Type Parameters:
    EKUtils -
    EKUtils -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Terminable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class EKHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Terminable
    This class handles all the complexities for starting the Request servers, stopping them, etc. It is written for putting common code between Desktop and android in one place.
    Author:
    sbhunia

      • run

        public void run()
        This method start the service and create two Request server threads. If the request servers can not be started (mainly due to bind exception), the function returns false otherwise it returns true and try to connect to the GNS server.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
